Namespace Microsoft.ReverseProxy.Abstractions

Classes

ActiveHealthCheckMonitorOptions

Defines options for the active health check monitor.

ActiveHealthCheckOptions

Active health check options.

CircuitBreakerOptions

Circuit breaker options.

Cluster

A cluster is a group of equivalent endpoints and associated policies. A route maps requests to a cluster, and Reverse Proxy handles that request by proxying to any endpoint within the matching cluster, honoring load balancing and partitioning policies when applicable.

ClusterPartitioningOptions

Cluster partitioning configures which endpoints in a cluster are eligible to process each request.

ConsecutiveFailuresHealthPolicyOptions

Defines options for the consecutive failures active health check policy.

Destination

Describes a destination of a cluster.

ProxyHttpClientOptions

ProxyMatch

Describes the matching criteria for a route.

ProxyRoute

Describes a route that matches incoming requests based on a the Match criteria and proxies matching requests to the cluster identified by its ClusterId.

QuotaOptions

Quota / throttling options.

RouteHeader

Route criteria for a header that must be present on the incoming request.
